8” Fumed Bell Dab Rig – Assorted

A5941

Log in for pricing

Handblown from the highest quality borosilicate glass, the 8” Fumed Bell Dab Rig provides top-quality dabs in a compact, elegant, and user-friendly package.

 

  • High-quality Borosilicate Glass
  • Bell Beaker Design w/ Reinforced Base
  • Bent Neck w/ Rimmed Mouthpiece
  • Fixed Showerhead Percolator
  • 5mm Female Joint; Male Banger
  • Beautiful Fumed Glass Pattern
  • Available in a Variety of Assorted Colours

 

This compact-sized dab rig has a straightforward, functional design that is suitable to beginners and veteran smokers alike. The fumed glass patterns give it an elegant and mysterious look to enhance the dabbing experience. Its high-quality construction makes it a breeze to clean and maintain, ensuring that it will last for years with proper care.

If you’re in the market for a beautiful yet reasonably priced dab rig that delivers impactful hits every time, then the 8” Fumed Bell Dab Rig will make a perfect addition to your collection.

Famous X

Famous X Drip Dab Rig Clear 7 in.

A5483

Log in for pricing

Famous X launched a collection of dab rigs, featuring 3 unique shapes with percolators all taking a minimalistic approach of clear glass adorned with a black Famous Brandz star. Each piece comes in its own well-designed and functional box.

Drip is made from high quality, handblown borosilicate glass, and sits 7”/17.78cm tall. This simple, yet functional pear shaped rig is easy to clean and maintain. It features a showerhead percolator which adds diffusion and makes the hit super smooth. Drip comes with a 14mm male quartz banger for optimal hits. Easier and more efficient than other attachments for rigs, quartz bangers also offer extreme heat tolerance making it the ideal choice.

If you are in the market for an excellent, scientific-style rig for your dabbing needs look no further. Drip and all of the rigs in the new Famous X collection are the perfect additions to your collection.

Dopezilla has launched a new collection that includes five horrifying dab rigs, all adorned with their own nefarious monster. The Banshee by Dopezilla is made from handblown borosilicate glass that can stand the test of time, delivered in its own matching custom box.

The 10” Banshee straight tube comes delivered with a male 14.5mm quartz banger. A banger is the preferred method for dabbing, making it easier and more efficient to use than typical accessories of the past.

Guns N Roses

APPETITE FOR DESTRUCTION GUNS N’ ROSES DAB RIG – 10”

BB1228

Log in for pricing

The wait is over! One of the greatest hard rock bands of our time, Guns N’ Roses, has finally released their own officially licensed line of smoking accessories. In this cool, new collection are six designs, including a water pipe, a dab rig, 2 grinders and 2 styles of hand pipes all featuring iconic artwork familiar to superfans and anyone who loves rock music. Sit back and use Appetite for Destruction, a 10” hexagon base dab rig, with a sidecar mouthpiece and funky body.

This handblown borosilicate glass hexagon base dab rig includes a fixed downstem, and features a fritter percolator which provides optimal filtration and an enhanced smoking experience. Appetite for Destruction comes with a 14mm quartz banger to allow for using your extracts easily and more efficiently. The sidecar mouthpiece adds distance between your mouth and the banger for excellent hits. The design of the body gives an ideal spot to hold it for comfort and security. Quickly cleaning your banger in between hits or more frequently helps keep it in better condition.

Appetite for Destruction features the quintessential Appetite for Destruction skull portrait imagery and font at the bottom of the rig and in the middle a fun graffiti style Guns N’ Roses was here text graphic compliments the red splatter behind the bottom illustration

This 10” hexagon base dab rig offers diffusion and epic GNR images, making it perfect as an everyday water pipe for solo sessions or for sharing (and showing off) to friends. Fans and smoking connoisseurs alike will love this awesome design. The entire line of Guns N’ Roses smoking accessories is available to order, right here, while supplies last.

Famous Design Dab Rig Versuz 8 inch

A5221

Log in for pricing

Famous Brandz launched a new collection that includes six epic pieces: two dab rigs and four water pipes, all equipped with their own colorful or futuristic design. All of the pieces in this eye-catching collection are handcrafted from the thick borosilicate glass that is able to withstand the test of time, delivered in their own matching custom box.

Versuz is part of the collection and features swirling circular shapes with a fall favorite colorway on a stacked sidecar rig. It has a fixed re-enforced downstem to prevent accidents while cleaning and comes equipped with a honeycomb percolator. The percolator adds extra diffusion and provides a smoother, cleaner hit.

This 8” rig also includes a male 14.5mm quartz banger. A banger is the preferred method for dabbing, making it easier and more efficient to use than typical accessories of the past. Black accents on the mouthpiece and on the thick, stable base give this dab rig an even more sophisticated appearance.

A5009DB

Log in for pricing

Dopezilla Glass Straight Tube Ice Rig – Cerberus

Act fast, the hound of Hades who guards the underworld is here

  • High quality borosilicate glass
  • Straight tube
  • 14.5mm ground joint
  • 14.5mm quartz banger
  • Bullet-hole ice pinch
  • No carb hole
  • Colourful accents on the mouthpiece, bowl, base and monster logo

Dopezilla has launched a new collection that includes four epic pieces: three bongs and one dab rig, all adorned with their own horrifying monster. The Cerberus by Dopezilla is handcrafted from the finest borosilicate glass that is able to withstand the test of time, all delivered, safely stored, in their own matching custom box.

Part of this fun collection is Cerberus, a clear straight tube ice rig with a quartz banger and coloured base, percolator, mouthpiece and custom monster logo is extremely easy to clean and maintain. The honeycomb percolator helps break up the smoke to deliver extra smooth hits. It features ice notches, for optimal filtration with a frosty touch.

The Cerberus straight tube comes delivered with a male quartz banger. The banger allows you to easily heat your extracts without the hassle that comes with a nail and dome. The shape allows for the piece to not roll when placed on a table.

So if you are on the lookout for a solid and unique straight tube ice rig to add to your glass collection, you have found your perfect match. Purchase Cerberus, and the rest of the Dopezilla collection, right here for the best available prices.

Dopezilla has launched a new collection that includes four epic pieces: three bongs and one dab rig, all adorned with their own horrifying monster. Cheech and Chong Up in Smoke

Cheech and Chong Up In Smoke Anthony Dab Rig

BB1143R

Log in for pricing
Cheech & Chong's Anthony's is made from heat-resistant borosilicate glass and is equipped with a reinforced fixed downstem that connects to the powerful, double-tier showerhead percolator for maximum filtration.


Specifications
• High-quality borosilicate glass
• Double-tier showerhead percolator
• Reinforced fixed downstem
• 14.5mm male joint
• 14.5mm female vapor dome with roll stopper handles
• Unique Quartz Banger
• Glass concentrate nail included
• Stable circular foot
• Colored glass accents
• Decorated with Cheech & Chong's decal

This powerful oil rig has a reinforced fixed downstem with a male 14.5mm joint. The glass concentrate nail that is included with your purchase slides in the joint perfectly and the 14.5mm vapor dome with female joint seamlessly connects with the 14.5mm male joint. The vapor dome comes with two side handles for easy removal that also act as perfect roll stoppers.

The vapor is pulled down the fixed downstem and through the submerged slits in the double-tier showerhead percolator where it gets filtered and cooled by the water. This process results in a smoother more enjoyable hit that’s full of flavor and less harsh on the throat and lungs.

The bubbler measures 21 cm / 8.25 inches in height and has a thick base that provides great stability. Beautiful apple green colored glass accents can be seen on the handles of the vapor dome, the rim of the foot, the rim of the mouthpiece and on the reinforced downstems joint.
